EmailTemplate.description: Custom email template designed for P1-006
EmailTemplate.name: Application In Capture Template
EmailTemplate.subject: New Application {!Application__c.Name} created for {!Application__c.Applicant1FirstName__c} {!Application__c.Applicant1LastName__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We need to verfiy your identity.
{!LEFT(Contact.FirstName,1) + LOWER(RIGHT(Contact.FirstName,LEN(Contact.FirstName)-1))}, We couldn't digitally verify your identity. Because we don't have branches, we need to take a couple of online steps which we will do via video call:
Date: Thursday, 20 October 2020 Time: 5:30pm
JOIN VIDEO CALL
A member of Nano Customer Support will connect with you at this time. It should only take a few minutes, is totally private and all you need to bring is your smiling face and two forms of photo ID (e.g. driver's license, passport or proof of age card).
If this does not work with your schedule, please call Nano Customer Support on 12 NANO (13 6266) or email us at help@nano.com.au to reschedule.
As this is a regulatory requirement, we will be recording and storing the video call in accordance with our Privacy Policy which can be read here on our website.
CONTACT US 13 NANO (13 6266) • help@nano.com.au
